cards.alt: A dog sitting in the woods
cards.title: Everyone Needs a Special 'Sit Spot' in Nature
cards.text: Ever since I read Richard Louv's influential book, "Last Child in the Woods," the idea of having a special "sit spot" has stuck with me. This advice, which Louv attributes to nature educator Jon Young, is for both adults and children to find...
